BrightBuds – Terms and Conditions

Last Updated: November 2025

1. Purpose of the App

BrightBuds is an educational mobile application designed for early childhood learning. It combines songs, interactive games, and progress tracking tools to support literacy and numeracy development in children aged 2 to 6.

2. Parental Responsibility and Consent

  • Only verified parents or guardians may create and manage child profiles.
  • Parental consent is required before any child information is created or stored.
  • Parents are responsible for monitoring their child’s activities and securing their devices.

3. Privacy and Data Protection

  • BrightBuds complies with COPPA and follows strict data-minimisation practices.
  • Personal data (child names, photos, words) is encrypted locally using AES-256.
  • Only anonymised learning metrics are synced to Firebase for reporting.
  • Parents may review or delete their child’s data at any time from the dashboard.
  • No advertising, third-party tracking, or data selling occurs in BrightBuds.

4. Offline and Online Use

All modules work offline using local SQLite storage. When internet connectivity is restored, data automatically synchronises with Firebase using timestamp-based conflict resolution to ensure consistency.

5. Security Measures

  • All network communication is protected with HTTPS/TLS encryption.
  • Database integrity is enforced through unique identifiers and foreign-key constraints.
  • Administrative actions are logged and auditable.
  • Backups and recovery snapshots prevent data loss or corruption.

6. Accessibility and Inclusivity

  • The interface follows WCAG accessibility standards with clear icons and high-contrast colors.
  • Voice prompts support children who are not yet readers or have learning differences.
  • Parents may customise modules with family photos or local language content.

7. Acceptable Use

Users agree to use BrightBuds solely for educational and non-commercial purposes, not to modify or distribute the application’s content, and to report any bugs or security issues responsibly.

8. Content and Intellectual Property

All learning materials, games, graphics, and songs are the intellectual property of the BrightBuds Team. Unauthorised reproduction or redistribution is prohibited.

9. Data Retention and Deletion

  • Data is retained only while the parent account is active.
  • Deleting a child profile removes associated progress data permanently.
  • Backup data is automatically purged within 30 days of deletion.

10. Limitation of Liability

BrightBuds is provided “as is” for educational use. The developers are not responsible for data loss, misuse, or device issues resulting from user error or unauthorised modification.

11. Updates to These Terms

These Terms and Conditions may be updated periodically to reflect legal or feature changes. Parents will be notified of significant updates through the Parent Dashboard.

12. Contact Information

For support or privacy enquiries, contact us at info@BrightMinds.com.
